channel.title: CVE Feed for WordPress -- Requests
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WordPress -- Requests

item.title: CVE-2021-29476|2024-08-03T22:11:05.121Z -- wordpress -- requests
item.description: Requests is a HTTP library written in PHP. Requests mishandles deserialization in FilteredIterator. The issue has been patched and users of `Requests` 1.6.0, 1.6.1 and 1.7.0 should update to version 1.8.0.
